page.title: 17EMPLOYMENT FOR CRAWLEY DOWN
page.content: The{majority}of people in Crawley Down are{employed.}Nearly three quarters of all the households in Crawley Down and Turners Hill have only one person in {full time employment.}About a quarter have two people in a full time job. {Part time employment}occupies one person in about a third of the households in the two villages. The people in Crawley Down work mainly at {Gatwick Airport, Crawley, East {Grinstead, London}and in the{Croydon {area,}in roughly equal amounts. Of the people in Turners Hill, similar proportions work in East Grinstead and Crawley. Very few people who live in Crawley Down work in Crawley Down. However more than{one third of the {people in Turners Hill work in their {village.}The reason more people who live in Turners Hill work there is probably because there are more farms.
